name: Swords N' Goons
description:
Fight goons, and upgrade your gear in the action RPG "Swords N' Goons"! 

This game was submitted for the "Improve my Game Jam #12" and it is a remake of my old rpg made in scratch, only this time I used Unity. In this remake I focused more on the combat, because in the old scratch version the game was very clunky and the combat wasn't fun, but I feel in this version there is a huge IMPROVEMENT!

A devlog detailing the creation of this game will come out soon on my gamedev youtube channel - Fopull - YouTube

I hope you enjoy playing, and please leave me some feedback in the comments!
